授業方法: The class will be conducted online via Zoom (simultaneous and two way). Please see "Note" how to join the first online class. Based on weekly readings of case studies and class discussions, students will gain a broad understanding of contemporary Japanese pop culture from a business and social science perspective. At the beginning of each class, students will discuss the assigned case study followed by explanations from the instructor, which are supplemented with additional class materials.
